objects.text:
• MARSHALL SIGNATURE SOUND
• 100+ HOURS WIRELESS PLAYTIME
• RUGGED & FOLDABLE DESIGN
• WIRELESS CHARGING

product_details.description: True icons never die; they just get better with time. Major V is no different. From its explosive Marshall signature sound to its everlasting design, every detail of these headphones has been painstakingly considered and refined. Featuring 100+ hours of wireless playtime combined with a rugged and foldable design, Major V is best paired with your next great adventure. MARSHALL SIGNATURE SOUND: Thunderous bass, smooth mids and crisp treble. Major V delivers the Marshall signature sound you know and love. 100+ HOURS OF WIRELESS PLAYTIME: Your next adventure awaits, and Major V is in for the ride. Packing 100+ hours of wireless playtime, you can be gone for days. RUGGED AND FOLDABLE DESIGN: Rugged so that it lasts. Foldable for compact storage. Major is an instant classic for the fifth time running. CUSTOMISABLE M-BUTTON: Instantly access the Spotify Tap default function or your EQ settings or voice assistant thanks to Major V’s M-button and the Marshall Bluetooth app WIRELESS CHARGING: We don’t like wires either, they just get in the way. Thanks to wireless charging, it’s simple to give Major V a boost when needed. Brand - Marshall ** Color - Black ** Ear Placement - On Ear ** Form Factor - On Ear ** Noise Control - None **

banner_details:
This banner showcases a modern product layout with a bold focus on a wireless headphone model. The design is split into quadrants using a grid-like blueprint background in alternating deep and muted blue tones with light grid lines. The main product is displayed prominently on the right side as an image layer (`product_image`), scaled to draw attention. The left side contains well-structured text layers. The prominent brand name (`heading_1`) and product title (`heading_2`) use bold fonts to establish hierarchy, followed by a subtle tagline (`tagline`) and a feature list (`description`). Price information (`price`) is clearly emphasized, complemented by a rectangular call-to-action box (`cta_background`) with the button text (`cta`). Decorative dotted lines and faint circles add subtle depth.

**Color palette:**
- Deep Navy Blue: #1E3D59
- Muted Steel Blue: #2B5278
- Light Gray (Text & Accents): #C0C0C0
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image showcases a stylish black Marshall headphone with a matte and textured leather finish. The dominant color is jet black (#000000), creating a sleek and premium aesthetic. Subtle tonal variations in the textured earcups and headband add depth through highlights in charcoal gray (#2C2C2C) and cool dark slate (#1F1F1F). The white Marshall logo (#FFFFFF) contrasts sharply against the black, ensuring brand visibility. A muted gold (#C8A54A) detailing near the audio jack provides an elegant accent, hinting at luxury without overwhelming the design. These colors blend seamlessly to emphasize sophistication while maintaining clarity and elegance for an advertisement banner.
